name: StuntHog
description:
STUNTHOG:

EDIT: Chrome blackscreens if hardware acceleration is turned off 

Entry for mini-jam 31 Movies with the limitation of no frame (or keyframe) based animation.

Take on control of a stunt hedgehog and hurl him towards the goal. Everything is either physics based or directly interpolated in code, as per the limitation.

Controls (Also listed in-game):

Aim: Mouse

Fire: Left Mouse

Reset current level: R

No hedgehogs were harmed in the making of this game.
